V03upsmpjnu:77_1_0: evam eva bhikṣur evaṃrūpaṃ sthānam adhyāpadya yāvad apratyuddhāryam asya bhavati śrāmaṇyaṃ atra te 'dyāgreṇānadhyācāre 'nadhyāpattāv
V03upsmpjnu:77_1_1: anadhyācāravairamaṇyāṃ tīvraś cetasa ārakṣā smṛtyapramāde yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ (Upj(J) 25.

V03upsmpjnu:79_1_0: tataḥ paścāc catvāraḥ śramaṇakarakā dharmā ārocayitavyāḥ evañ ca punar ārocayitavyāḥ śṛṇu tvam āyuṣmaṃś catvāra ime tena
V03upsmpjnu:79_1_1: bhagavatā jānatā paśyatā tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena evaṃ pravrajitopasaṃpannasya bhikṣoḥ śramaṇakarakā dharmā ākhyātāḥ
V03upsmpjnu:80_1_0: adyāgreṇa te āyuṣmann ākruṣṭena na pratyākroṣitavyaṃ roṣitena na pratiroṣayitavyaṃ tāḍitena na pratitāḍayitavyaṃ bhaṇḍitena
V03upsmpjnu:80_1_1: na pratibhaṇḍayitavyaṃ kaccid evaṃrūpaṃ sthānaṃ nādhyāpatsyase tena vaktavyaṃ nādhyāpatsye (Upj(J) 25.
V03upsmpjnu:81_1_0: śṛṇu tvam āyuṣman yas te 'bhūt pūrvam āśāsakaḥ kaccid ahaṃ labheya svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyām upasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣubhāvaṃ
V03upsmpjnu:81_1_1: sa tvam etarhi pravrajita upasaṃpannaḥ pratirūpeṇopādhyāyena pratirūpābhyām ācāryābhyāṃ samagreṇa saṃghena jñapticaturthena
V03upsmpjnu:82_1_0: yatra varṣaśatopasaṃpannena bhikṣuṇā śikṣāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ tatra tadaha upasaṃpannena yatra tadaha upasaṃpannena tatra varṣaśatopasaṃpannena
